hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated by Qatada with the same chain of transmitters. And in the hadith transmitted by Sa'id and Hisham, (the words are):" The Apostle of Allah (ﷺ) was asked about qirat, and he said: It is equivalent to Uhud

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْجَنَازَةِ وَاتِّبَاعِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of offering the funeral prayer and following the bier
